Send a public message to your timeline.
Send a private message to a user.

Send a random fake geoposition coordenate with your message.
Sometimes you need to activate: "geolocation" options on your social network user profile.
If is activate, this will appear publically on your timeline as the source of the message.
Using AnonTwi on shell mode, you can controle this coordenates.

Encrypt your message with: AES + HMAC-SHA1
This is a strong protection method of your data with only 140 characters of margin.
You have more info here:
http://anontwi.sourceforge.net/anontwi-encrypt.html
Enter the user that you want to send a private message.
Count the number of characters and waves (blocks of 140 characters) of your message.
This will split your message into blocks of 140 characters.
Send your message to the Internet.

Generate a random sequence of characters to use like key to interchange with your recievers.
We use this method to be sure that you use a VERY STRONG password.
To interchange that password, try to use secure methods.
Sometimes talking, giving a paper, using GPG, Off The Record on you pidgin.
Whatever... try to keep your secret. It will protect your information.
Enter your encrypted text directly, or the url of the messages with contain it.
Ask tou your friend for your Secret PIN. Use safe channels (such as GPG, or OTR) to interchange this information.
Secret PIN that you friend gives to you.
Descrypt messages directly or from a url.
Enter the user that you want to save messages.
Number of messages to save on disk:

Set the number of messages of your timeline that you want to save on disk. By default is: 15
Remember that this depends of the API of your social network.
For example; Twitter supposedly allows 3200 messages to be saved as limit.
After click on 'Backup' button, you will have a text file on "backups" folder with your messages.
Save messages to disk, if is possible.
Short long urls to tiny urls.

This will try to 'suicide' yourself. That means, to remove your public/private messages, your friendships, etc. And finally, will try to close your account.
Attention: this process can take long time so be patient!!
